about_the_game:
Welcome to the VR virtual combat game! In this game, you will play a heroic interstellar dinosaur rescueman. Your mission is to rescue dinosaurs who are captured by Star poackers in the exotic forest.

Players need to rescue 20 dinosaurs without discovery. Each dinosaur is detained in the hidden position set up by the Star poacher and needs to be rescued by players. Players can use their wisdom and skills to find the position of dinosaurs and rescue them. However, it should be noted that once the stagger is discovered, the player will face the danger of life. At this time, the player needs to fight a fierce fight with the poacher. Therefore, while rescue the dinosaur, players also need to always be Pay attention to your own health to avoid being killed by the poacher.



In order to cope with the attacks of the poacher, players can use weapons to fight back. In addition to rescue dinosaurs and blow hunters, players can also explore in the jungle to enjoy the beautiful exotic scenery.



The game uses high -quality 3D screens and real physical engines, making players seem to be in a real jungle. Experience trees and forests, and the grass with lush grass.



Come to join this game, become a real dinosaur protector, protect these beautiful and fragile lives, challenge your gun war skills, and explore the secrets in the jungle.

Operation method:

Walk around the left handle up/down/left/right
Turn the right handle left/right
Turn on the right handle trigger
Reset the VR left handle grip button
Load the bullet right handle grip key

Players need to rescue 20 dinosaurs without discovery. Each dinosaur is detained in the hidden position set up by the Star poacher and needs to be rescued by players. Players can use their wisdom and skills to find the position of dinosaurs and rescue them. However, it should be noted that once the stagger is discovered, the player will face the danger of life. At this time, the player needs to fight a fierce fight with the poacher. Therefore, while rescue the dinosaur, players also need to always be Pay attention to your own health to avoid being killed by the poacher.



In order to cope with the attacks of the poacher, players can use weapons to fight back. In addition to rescue dinosaurs and blow hunters, players can also explore in the jungle to enjoy the beautiful exotic scenery.



The game uses high -quality 3D screens and real physical engines, making players seem to be in a real jungle. Experience trees and forests, and the grass with lush grass.



Come to join this game, become a real dinosaur protector, protect these beautiful and fragile lives, challenge your gun war skills, and explore the secrets in the jungle.

Load the bullet right handle grip key

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC Vive
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC Vive
